name: Duel (itch) (Astat)
description:
DUEL is a game where you fight against an evil boss that wants to take over the world and you need to defeat him. Moreover, you need to stay alive as much as possible. Use different types of defences to protect yourself from bullets that are flying everywhere! 

There are different types of difficulty. On each one of them you'll be able to deal different amounts of damage, boss will deal you more or less damage, bullets will be homing and boss will have a lot more health than usual. To help you, there are multiple powerups that are waiting for you to pick them up! They also give you grenades! 

Controls:

  • Space - jump (obviously)
  • Q - throw a grenade
  • E - toggle shield
  • R - reload gun

Good luck beating it!!!
